content.detailedDescription: There was a row directly above the water and i was driving home when i noticed to my right and down below at water level this red orb and i thought it was a directional light for a boat or the report or starboard like which of course it wasn't i thought it was sort of funny because it was moving so fast and then it accelerated to an unbelievable speed came off the water rose quite high and went off and on northwesterly direction
content.summary: I was watching what i thought was a boat on the water i was on a road above the boat or above the water and this red light came across the water lifted off the water and shot off into the night in the northwest direction

content.detailedDescription: We were remolding a house in the woods west of fort stewart ga, near glenville, that no one had lived in for years. no others in the area. during the night we were woke up by lights and military jeeps in the woods. we went out side. the first jeep i saw was behind the house heading north slowly. another come down the two track road in front of the house. since the house had been empty for so long and there was no power, i assumed they thought it was still empty and never noticed us. the next thing we noticed was military helicopters. then we could see they were escorting something moving real slow. at first we were speculating from the shape it was a plane. but it was moving way to slow. it would of lost lift moving that slow and was huge. it got closer and went right over the top of us. it blocked out all the light from the sky for a minute or so. it was at least as big as football field.  it had no lights and made no sound. several minutes after it was past a couple more jeeps past by. i ask folks that i knew on post and no one new anything. i told a local man that knew the post commander and he claimed he knew nothing.
content.summary: Large dark triangle no sound

content.detailedDescription:
I'm now 68 yrs old this happened when i was in college and i was around 18 yrs old at the time. i was visiting cousins in the countryside and were returning home around 1:00 am. it was a clear starlit night without a single cloud in the sky. for some reason i looked up as we got out of the car. i saw what i first thought were contrails left by an aircraft, except that they were not in a straight line as you would expect. instead it was all close in the form of a misshaped heart. we kept looking at it for some reason glued to the sight when i noticed like a pin spot of light at one end of that contrail, all of a sudden it started to get brighter and brighter to the point that the starlit sky became blue like during daylight and no stars were visible, i don't know how long this lasted but we remained glued to the event until the light started to slowly diminished and i could not see the light source and the stars returned. it was at this time that we looked at each other and dashed inside as all the dogs in the area started howling at once. i could not tell you with any certainty how long this event took place as we were mesmerized throughout the event.
by the way, a few years later my mother and sister saw a disk shaped object fly from the roof of their condominium to their eye level very close to them, and started moving towards them until my sister started screaming then it moved away slowly. neighbors came out and saw it also, i was away in the military at the time and was not a witness. my sister saw figures on the windows on the side of the object.
content.summary: Bright light

content.detailedDescription:
This event happened around the first moon walk. i would of been around 14 then. we lived in oak cliff texas, which is a suburb of dallas. i was being punished and sent to my room. i was just listening to the tv and looking out the window.
i saw a white light, moving almost like a streak across the sky. it then immediately slowed, which i thought was unusual. it then moved very slow and had 1 orbiting light which revolved around the larger center light.
at first i thought it could be a helicopter, but that orbiting light wasnt what helicopters do. i hallored for my dad to come see.
we than ran to the car and begin to follow the lights. as well as alot of other people as. it moved slowly, we kept up with it and we were doing not more then 70 during the entire event. the light would continue to circle. it moved to the west out towards what was called ltv. a airworks place in grand prairie i believe. it stopped what seemed like of the air field. hovered for not much more than a minute. then angled off to the east and quickly disappeared.
my reactions was of "i really wanna see this what ever it is" i was scared because i believed it was a ufo. after the event, i begun to notice all the other cars and people. there were at least 10 cars stopped.
i remember how the excitement was. there was lots there at the ending of the event with the other people. my father went on and on about it for a few days.

as  i stated before, the craft hovered over the air field and went up and eastward very fast. it was gone in a couple of seconds.

added note: i choose "other" in "evidence" as this person is in public and is known. not sure if i can mention this person.
content.summary: Lights moving slowly across the night sky

content.detailedDescription: We were having our annual powwow this light was coming from the north and we were all outside almost the whole block at there homes we were at ours  the we started to talk we said its starting then mom said if you go to the powwow be safe because look what's coming it's starting already flight for life we all got quiet and we said its going to be a scary weekend then my sister said its getting close do you hear the sound we listen then my cousin was on the road she said to mom auntie do you see that the light is coming closer slowly and we all started to tell everyone look. look at the light the helicopter has no sound the light was right above the bridge it stops we were looking at it then in a blink it went straight up we counted the sec it was almost four sec but we said one one thousand two two thousand there threethou then it was out of the earths atmosphere and lost in the stars we were so shocked when we stood there in amazement to what did we see.  i was not scared till we notice that the object went straight up an so quickly that it was mind boggling that it scared us we stayed home that nigh we talked about this to others they just said its just a fluke so we just kept this to ourselves till now
content.summary: Circle shaped ball flew straight up

content.detailedDescription: I was in the pool at 10:10 i looked up towards the moon and there was something round shaped  glowing yellow.  it looked to be about 3/4 the size of the moon. then it slowly floated in a straight line for about 30 seconds  then just disappeared.
content.summary: Giant yellow ball floating in the sky

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and her boyfriend were outside talking so i decided to take out the trash. as i was coming back inside i noticed an object with pulsating lights in the night sky. it remained stationary with no sound. i went inside to get my cell and took pictures and video. it seemed to appear and fade and then come back. it was pretty far so the quality of pictures and video is not too goid. lights changed color from red orange to bluish. lights were pulsating. we watched it for about 2 minutes and then it just dissapeared. when i go outside at night i love to look at the stars and this night it was something i had never seen before. very different from another sighting i experienced back in 1985 at a small inn called "parador villa antonio" in rincon, puerto rico.
content.summary: I went outside to take out trash when we noticed the lights hovering

content.detailedDescription: It's about 2:30 in the afternoon very sunny day no clouds in the sky.  my friend and i and older next door neighbor we're walking to the beach. as we walk along the boardwalk in the sand dunes as soon as we saw the ocean,, about 10 or 12 or more lights ascended down from space. they began zigzagging across the sky extremely fast faster than anything ever. they were pulsating flashing and zig zagging. we watch this for 35 minutes or more with hundreds of people on the beach watching it as well. then about that time, 2 jet fighters flew in from the south breaking the sound barrier.That was the first time i had ever seen a jet breaking the sound barrier in real life. as soon as the jets got to the location generally of the lights, the lights shot straight up in to space seemingly. as we follow the lights up, we see another object this one is very big and is right over top of us. it seems to be camouflage or cloaked with 3 red lights on each in of the triangular shaped craft.While we are looking straight up at this object, the military jets are flying around in circles trying to track the objects that had shot straight up into space. this lasted a good 45 minutes. daytime absolutely clear sky. the triangular shaped object seem too high for the jets to get too.Then the objects seemingly faded away into the distance until we couldn't see it anymore it was very big.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Daytime light fell from space.Orb like flashing very fast and moving in a zigzag patern back and forth across the sky super fast right in front of us with lots of people seeing to over 100.Lasted 40mn then 2 jet fighters flew in from the south breakisound

content.detailedDescription:
my husband and i have been watching these objects for years. we have told friends but never reported them. now it's time. i personally have seen 4 different types of objects in the past 10-12 years.From about 2004 to the present. the first one was an object with rotating blue,red,green and yellow lights. this was at night.  it was hovering above the tree line on the hill across from my house,it started moving up and down rising above and descending below the trees.Then moved back and forth. i watched it for about 30-35 minutes. then it shot off. i believe this same one a few months ago,was the same one that about 1am four helicopters came flying over the holler where i live and i saw the object bolt to the north at amazing speed and disappear in a bright flash of light. we still observe it regularly.
 the second type of object i saw was up close on a bright sunny day. no more than 50-60 ft. and is my favorite. i live a mile off a black top road,up a dirt road. along my property before turning in the driveway is really grown up with natural wild growth of tall weeds and grasses. i turned in the driveway and to my right in the small field below my pond was a cigar shaped,opaque and shimmering (like the inside of an oyster shell)craft,just hovering above the ground. as i drove slowly up the driveway, it just glided along up towards the pond and vanished. while i was watching it i had the feeling of joy and happiness. it was wonderful! i will never forget that experience.
 the third type of object i saw in daylight,was a silver cigar shaped solid craft that was moving slowly at an odd angle,not like a plane. i pulled over at the little country store and watched it for a few minutes. a man got out oh his truck and i asked him what he thought it was. he said it looks like a plane. i asked him if he could hear it, he said no. then i asked him if he had ever seen a plane fly at that angle, he said no. i asked him if he still thought it was a plane.. he said well yeah. lol! i honestly tried to get him to open his eyes and mind.
 this last object.. my husband, my neighbor and myself see all the time lately. it is a very bright white large orb. sometimes it close and sometimes farther away. usually it just hovers. but we watch it anyway. last week one night after my husband went to bed(about 11:30 or so). i went out to see if it was there and it was. i had a bright idea to get my laser pointer out and try something. i took the pointer and began making spirals (fibonacci-sequence,and the golden ratio). i made about 5 of them and this object shot backwards till i could barely see it. i watched it a few seconds and thought it was gone..Turned to go back in the house and looked back and there it was. it is a regular visitor.
 thank you for letting me share my experiences. i was scared to go public with them,but i figured why not. keep your eyes to the sky!!!
content.summary: Saw it hovering, shoot off to barely visible and reappear closer

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my recording studio, driving back home around 4 in the morning. i look up and see a very bright blue light flash in the sky, it sits in the same spot for about 10 seconds, then i watch as it essentially jumps through the sky right in front of me, it was more like a hop though, i try to see it go as far as i can but it simply vanished. the lights seemed to be circling around each other, and they were so bright and unlike any plane lights that i would commonly see because my job at the time required me to drive most nights. these lights and the shape of this made me positive it wasn't a plane. i know what i saw, and i am positive this was a ufo.
content.summary: Driving down road saw a disc like object flashing lights through the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
We were at the zoo. this object came above us....Circled a while
then left
flew off and a weird angle
then it returned a short while later
circled again and left again
my son noticed it the second time

this is not the only time however.
i feel i have been abducted repeatedly.
including implanted
i feel they have a relationship with me
and they have explained many things to me
such as the reasons behind their dna grabbing.
i think i have had implants, experimentation
multiple abductions
and i even had a shape shifting entity come right into my bedroom.

this thing looked human at first
then shifted into a dragon like being complete with a tail and snout

most people are afraid of them
i am not
i understand why they do what they do
and have undergone some strange things personally
they put me once into a vat of liquid with other people
they told me to inhale the liquid for it was to replace the air in my lungs in order for long space travel

one took me to mars and showed me a garden in a glass dome
i realized as i was looking at this garden i was holding hands with someone

i looked down
and it was a grey.
he had 3 fingers and a thumb


i need someone to talk to ...These events have led me to question my own sanity
they speak to me at random directly into my brain
they have told me things no one could know.
please help me.
i am not afraid of these beings
i am afraid for my own sanity

i would also mention
my aunt, grandfather, and mother have seen things too.
content.summary: My son and girlfriend also witnessed ...Red glowing pulsing light changed directions rapidly left then returned

content.detailedDescription:
On midwatch onboard uss putnam (dd757) in med, radar operator called  in on intercom, come in here (cic) and look at this. i left sonar shack and went to cic to look at radar scope, there were 6 objects flying in formation off the starboard side of the ship. went out on the wing of the bridge and observed 6 objects(lights) flying in formation approx. 2-3 miles from the ship. observed for a few minutes, objects made a sharpe 90 degree turn and accelerated off the radar scope. the radar operator estimated their speed on acceleration at 4,000+ miles per hour.
respectfully,
stg2--sonar technician
uss putnam(dd 757)
content.summary: On midwatch, aboard uss putnam(dd 757) 6 orbs in formation on radar, watched, excellarated to 4,000 + mph off radar scope

content.detailedDescription:
Before the sun going down around 21h00 pm. red flashing light within trees were getting my attention at the little lorraine forest. i stop my car instead to take the 640 eastbound from lorraine exit. i am working in commercial aircraft, and i was trying to know if it was an helicopter.... i know what is a navigation or beacon light..... but they were not... only red light... then the light that was within the little forest disapeared or change its orientation... then i saw an objetc with only steady red light hovering at treetop slowly and silently to the west... the speed was too slow and the object should crashed.... but it doesnt.... i saw a black object like triangle shaped.... but i was scpetic and i decided to take the highway to the east and go to another elevation point to see if i was able to see other white or green light commonly used in aviation. only steady red light was shown from the rear side of the presumed path of the object... illogic for me...

next time i saw something i will go very closer to the object. triyng to get a contact cause with time i am questionning myself if they were trying to get my attention at the exit with this flashing light. i felt that they want me to go to the building where they were heading. but i was sceptic, why me. 

i am not crazy and my wife do not believe me.... i did not talk to anyone else about that.... 

hope that testimony will help the truth to come through!
content.summary: Red flashing light within trees, then hovering over trees

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Driving home on a sunday night from a weekend down the jersey shore with my family in bumper to bumper traffic on route 35 north.My wife and daughter in the car.Wife was sleeping.Out of the corner of my left eye i notice something a light off in the distance.It was a foggy night.What ever it was is its low.I first thought it was the goodyear bimp maybe got caught in the fog.I rowed down the window there was no the sound.The sound of those motors are unmistable.Nothing no sound at all.My head is now all the way out the window.I'm a very noisey person.I now beginning to see part of this craft.I can see it is big.I can see two large round lights on its belly and off in the distance i think there is a third.I think the craft is triangle shape.I was scared and excited all at the same time.It was moving north very slowly right over us.My first thought under the radar how smart heavy fog good cover.And i'm now aware there are others in the cars around me see this object to.It was a drive home i will never forget. i have kept the sighting to my self for years.I;m a big fan of your show.I'm always looking and keep my mind open.Truth is we are not alone.Has the traffic started to move and i lost sight off it. i thought how lucky i was to be able to see this.People search there hole life in hope to see a real ufo and never do.But when i look at the stars i say how can will be the only life?The answer. weren"t not.Thank you for letting me tell my story. finally
content.summary: Triangle shape in heavy fog . at first thounght it was a blimp but it was silent.Then i know this was nothing i had ever seen

content.detailedDescription: i walked out in my back yard, looked up at the stars. it was a clear nite. the was one cloud overhead, about the size of two fists at arms lentgth. the cloud looked odd, more like a faint gallaxy. after about a minute it started to move to the west. about half way to the hill behind my my house a brite lite came on in the middle of it. stayed on till it went over the hill.
content.summary: Clear sky, looking at stars, saw one cloud that looked odd, started to move west, brite lite came on in the middle, slow moved over hill

content.detailedDescription: In the early 1980's i was at a healthy week-end with a friend of mine who had invited me to join her.   while in maine i met a woman at the lodge and i befriended her with a cup of coffee ( which was not in the lodge because they frowned on caffine) so i invited her to my cabin.  she informed me she was the  entertainment for the evening.  she happened to be a physic - which she was not born with but became one after a very severe accident.    she did a reading for me because i had befriended her at  the lodge.  she told me things about my current life which were dead on correct - then she said she had something else to tell me  but was not sure i was ready for it - and i said to her to "go for it".  she said that my mother was taken by aliens when she was pregnant with me and they implanted something in her that was to merge with the baby in her uterus ( which was me)    from there she said that they took me several times over many years  and they finally realized that the merge never took place and upon that knowledge they erased my memories  -   i was born in manchester new hampshire in 1948   - i understand that in1947 manchester was a hot spot for sightings of alien aircraft.   when i was 2 years old my mom had a partial historectomy because she had been having awful problems for a couple of years.  the doctors informed my mom that they removed something from her that had been in her for 2 years and their best guess was that it was my twin ( no one knew i had a twin)    i grew up in a trailer since my dad was in the air force and we moved from base to base - my mom said that i drove her crazy because i could get out of the trailer even when she was standing outside my bedroom door - this something she would tell me all through growing up  - i could escape from anywhere it seemed.  at 7 my dad died and we moved to mass. from kansas to live with my grandmother.  over the years i thought my lack remembering my early years was due to the death of my dad  - because my life begins at 7 years old.  well, not sure i have told the story well - but was wondering if you have other stories like this one.   sincerely  marsha
content.summary: Please read my story

content.detailedDescription: I had been sleeping on my couch in my living room.I awoke to a white misty light that blinded me. i kept blinking my eyes to clear my sight.The light dissapeared.I was in disbelief and then i jumped up and ran to my kitchen window.I saw a solid white ufo with a small dome on top of a round shaped base.It was to the right of my window approximently 500 ft.Away moving in a steady straight path behind my house.I watched until i could no longer see it beacause of the trees.I did eventually collect some leaves from a plant that sits at my kitchen window.
content.summary: I hi was sitting on my couch with eyes closed. when i opened my eyes i was blinded by a white mist of light.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from my job.  i was traveling southbound 360.  shortly after i pass glade road, i noticed an blue object traveling west to east.  i just sow the object for an brief moment.  my first thought was to do something with the air port but the object disappear and i was not able to find it.  the blue object was traveling slightly slower then an object ie space debris entering earth.
content.summary: Unknown blue object

content.detailedDescription: Three of us kids sleeping out in the back of the pick up truck staring at the stars about 10 pm where around fun our first night to camp out look we were staring at the stars it was a full moonall three of us went silent for about three minutes watching this eclipse of the moon was a cigar shaped object scared the hell out of us we all ran home told our parents and we can camp out.   the object moved in a steady pace from east to the west and a direct line it disappeared when it left the face or the shadow of the moon was gone we lost sight
content.summary: The eclipse looking cigar shaped flowing object in front of the moon lasted about three minutes and dark and the moon like an eclipse and then passed on weatherly course and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 1:12 am. i was out on my back porch listening to the radio and looking at the sky. i saw an airplane that must have been at least 5-10 miles away from where i was viewing and at a very high altitude. it was a very clear sky so i had no problem seeing the outline of the plane and could see the lights flashing. i remember thinking well i wish i could be up there with you pilots. 

then not even a minute later. i noticed this extremely bright light coming in from the corner of my eye traveling southwest. it was definitely moving faster than any conventional aircraft, but i could tell it was not moving full speed. i could see the light coming through a large tree before i got a full view of the object. as soon as i saw the light coming through the tree and saw how bright it was and how large it was i got up to get a better view of it once it passed the tree in my backyard.

to my surprise it was a very very large pure white sphere traveling across the sky. didn't seem like it was descending. was just traveling in a straight path in the sky. this object was brighter than the moon in the sky that night, brighter than any full moon i have ever seen. it was almost the size of the moon in the sky. there is no way this thing was a plane. it was simply massive. i've never seen any type of craft as large as this. football fields upon football fields. 

the light emitting from the craft was extremely white, white as paper, whiter than any man made light i have ever seen. whiter and brighter than the light that is reflected by the moon. i live near an airport and enjoy watching various jets, civilian planes, helicopters, etc, every single night. not even the brightest spotlight from helicopters could even touch on the scale of how bright this object was. 

it made absolutely no sound as it passed by. had no trail of any kind. i have seen hundreds of shooting stars, even a major meteor that was reported on my local news. that one was pretty bright but nothing like this and that had a trail and was descending as well. the way this was moving made it clear to me as soon as a saw it that it was being intelligently controlled.

when i first noticed the object i immediately thought it was a ufo. it was too large and bright to be a meteor, and traveled on such a straight not descending path. the amount of energy it would require to generate that much light made it clear to me it was not a meteor or something falling into the atmosphere. the path was just too linear for that.

as soon as i saw it i felt that i was witnessing something with a tremendous amount of energy being generated. unfortunately my house was in the way of its path so i only saw this object for 40-60 seconds, but that was more than enough. the sheer size of it and brightness. helicopters 100 feet off the ground wouldn't even compare. 

i have seen before what i thought was a ufo it was a bright orange disk that i saw fly by some power lines several years ago. that was brighter than any aircraft i had ever seen, plus our aircraft don't illuminate the entire outline of the craft. even that did not compare to the sighting i had tonight. 

i never imagined i would see anything else like that again, it was really a treat to see.
content.summary: Large bright white sphere. brighter than the full moon. almost as large as the the size of the visible moon.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were watching the persied meteor showers when we saw what we first thought was ameteor shoot over above us about 500 feet and stop in place.Then it moved 1000 ft or more in flash back and forth.Then jet off in other directions in a flash ..It did this for about one minute but always returned to the same point above us.Then another object came up to it from out of the east.As quickly as it came it jetted away back toward direction it came.Then the object we were watching made a high whine like a motor .Then it blasted off almost straight up in a flash.Luckily i spotted it a fraction of a second later.It was so far up that it was just a brightr dot in the sky and just as quickly faded away off into space.In no more than a second in time it took off and disapeered to what sempt like 20 miles to way off into space.My friend saw it as i did.This event was  over 45 years ago but has always remained so vivid in my mind as if i saw it two minutes ago.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Came quickly.Manuvered fast one spot to another.Another approached then took off.It then made high  whine and left in flash

content.detailedDescription: I was walking out of my house and i noticed blue blinking lights i watched as it moved across the night sky the object would stop and just bounce in one place light would dim then get bright blue my mom , neibor were also witnesses ! at one point i brought out binoculars that i had in my room and watched for about an hour until they disappeared ! i feel that i saw something relevant especially that there were other witness!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Pinapple shape blue lights change shape to orb

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling south on hwy 54 from almagordo nm to el paso tx and about 10-12 miles from el paso ( i was in the desert and could see the lights of el paso beyond the mountain range in front of me) a bright beam of high intensity white light surrounded my vehicle about 20 ft. in circumference all the way around my vehicle and was staying with me at approximately 70 mph for about 1/4 of a mile and lit up me and everything around me like it was daylight and then shut off. i thought it may have been a border patrol helicopter but the light was nothing i had ever seen before. when the light went off i stomped on the brakes of my vehicle and jumped out of the car ( i was in total darkness in the desert with absolutely no other traffic at all) and watched the craft head se about 6-7 miles toward a mountain range and the it made a sudden turn west and went behind a mountain range and out of my sight in a matter of 2-3 seconds. at the time i was in the florida national guard in training at ft. bliss in elpaso tx.  as a 24l missle systems operator / repairer and was visiting a boyhood friend who's ex wife was stationed in the air force and he lived in alamogordo nm. as soon as i got back to my unit i got on a pay phone and called my wife in florida and then called a very close friend that lived in st.Louis mo. and told them both of my experience at around 9:30 to 9:50 and they both thought i was crazy and making it up but after talking with both of them about my experience at great length they both knew that i wasn't lying about my encounter and i never reported it to the military because that is what i was in training for, identifying aircraft on a radar screen and using iff ( identifyier friend or foe) and this craft was not a civilian or military craft at the speeds it was traveling and i was not going to make a report to them.(the military)
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Extremely bright light then a supersonic departure se then west

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were driving from his house to another friend's house. on the way there approximately 4:30 pm we smelled the foul odour of sulfur as we passed the big red cattle barns. i didn't say it out loud, but i was thinking how weird it is to smell so strongly of sulfur when normally all you would smell is manure. we made it to our friends house and left around 6:30 pm it was now dark. when driving east past the local campground in the same area as cattle barn i spotted a 50 foot wide triangular ufo to the south hovering above the trees. i knew immediately, i was seeing something incredible. the ufo was dark metal in color almost black. in the center was a raised stainless steel triangular badge with an amber light flashing amber, white, off sequentially. on the upper corners were green dim lights that seemed to be casting light across the front of the object. i believe the ufo was conical in shape, but it was definitely triangular and hovering silently. i had my head out of the car window and shouted for my friend to stop the truck, i was so worked up, we were in a car. he slowed down and looked past me and confirmed what i was seeing, but wouldn't stop. we turned off the end of the road heading south and i could see it still for roughly another kilometer. after we got back to his place we discussed it and he was in denial big time, i left, took a bus home. walking home from the bus stop i saw two military helicopters returning to the local base. i like 2 kilometers from the cfb 14wing and i am used to seeing many military aircraft every day. as well we have a small municipal airport which flies cessna type planes. this was not a plane. it was two months before my friend finally came to terms with what happened and now admits it was definitely unidentifiable. we were both psychologically affected by this event. it was weeks before i could sleep well and move on with my life. we did not photograph the object unfortunately i did not have my phone with me, and i was in such shock i would probably nottingham even thought to take a video or photograph.
content.summary: Myself and justin drive past local campground, witness object hovering above the trees. justin refuses to stop vehicle, but slows down significantly.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my patio with my wife ellen shortly after watching a plane fly over us i noticed a triangle shaped craft high above the low patchy cloud cover, i looked at ellen and said "look, what is that?" she looked up and seen nothing i looked up to find it and just caught it go behind a cloud, ellen said "i don't see anything". i said "it went behind a cloud" so we waited for it to emerge from the other side of the cloud and sure enough there it was, i said what the h*ll is that? she seen it and in disbelief she said "i don't know". we watched it go off into the distance until we could no longer see it. we talked about reporting a ufo but wondered if it was really a ufo or just a new military aircraft since we did live near two air force bases the largest being hill air force base. since that day i have seen many triangle shapes in videos and pictures some on history channel mufon hanger 1 and thought i should report it
content.summary: A triangle shape craft with a single dot marking near the front tip

content.detailedDescription: I was star gazing with my telescope early in june 2004. i was looking at andromeda galaxy when i suddenly lost sight of it when i pulled away from the telescope i saw about 40 to 60 twinkling lights moving slowly all together, my first thought was "oh cool the iss"  but then as it moved further away i seen the silhouette in the glow of the city lights and i noticed a v shape with a line of the twinkling lights on the edges of the wings or side of the craft. i watched it as it blocked out stars and moved further away for about 6 to 8 minutes until it was no longer in sight. i looked at andromeda galaxy again but was soon bored knowing what i just seen so i called my girlfriend and excited i told her what i saw but she said i was crazy and just must be tired so i never really talked about it after that. i went outside to get my telescope scanning the sky but no more ufo was there so i went inside and did not sleep much that night, very puzzled and excited.
content.summary: A large v shape flat dark craft with a few twinkling lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I am an educated woman and chose not to report this for many years because it sounds crazy but i know what 3 people, including myself saw. what made me report this was i saw a tv show on history channel that spoke of a very similar experience after seeing the ufo's. these things also happened to me and i would like to further understand what happened. i will disclose these at a later time if you contact me in a way other than a public forum but it consists of small orbs in my house as well as dark shadowy figures.

my observations happened over the course of 3 days time. the first night i observed a bright light outside the window. there was something odd about it so i decided to go to the window to look at it. the light floated like a humming bird in the sky and i thought it might have been a helicopter but there was absolutely no sound. i observed this for about 20 minutes and this light would grow large, then small and moved like nothing i have ever seen before! as i watch it moved down the coast it stopped and hovered at a place to the left and a red beam of light came down from it at an angle of about a 45 degree to the left towards the ground. this beam pulsed and looked as though the cycling rate made the light look like it was moving upwards. i lost sight of it for about 10 seconds as it began to move again now down the coast to the right and passed by tree tops. i caught sight of it again 10 seconds later further up in the air. it hovered there for about 5 minutes, floating like a bee, making slight direction changes like a ping pong ball floating on a column of air. the light grew very bright and increased in size, then got dim, very dim to the point it almost disappeared from view and repeated this, alternating from large to small over the 5 minutes it remained there. all of a sudden the light shot straight up in the air and as it moved upwards, it looked like the stars warped around it and then returned to normal position.

the second night, i was watching for them at the same time of day. sure enough it was there only this time there were 3 of them. i called my ex-spouse to observe the objects in the sky and she became scared because they were not helicopters or airplanes. these objects moved around the sky very quickly and changed direction instantly! no plane or helicopter can do that. they also made no noise and at times came very close to where i was observing. (about 1/2 to 1 mile away). it looked like they were searching for something.

the third night, i had made mention to a friend earlier that day that if they were going to be there again that night, i was going to observe them from the beach. i kick myself that i never thought to grab a camera. that night, they were there so i called my friend and we both met at the beach and observed them flying over the water/ocean. it appeared that one of the craft was on the water and a triangle of red lights sat on the water. at one point a beam of white light, almost like a spot light scanned the boardwalk and stopped upon me and my friend momentarily. i gave it the finger and the light moved onward continuing down the shoreline to my right and then turned off.I made mention to my friend, "look, there are all these cars driving by and not one of them sees what we are watching?" we watched them for about 40 minutes and one flew directly over our heads. it was very large, and the lights were shaped like a square with one large white light in the center of the square. it flew about 1000 feet over our heads and made no sound at all. once this object passed over head, the other objects had gone and i didn't see them return again and all that was left in the sky was the occasional airplane.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Over 3 days observed 1 then 3 then 6 or 7 craft that seemed to be searching for something

content.detailedDescription: On wednesday, june 18, 2014, i was alerted by a fellow employee of unusual stationary lights in the sky. i would describe these lights as orbs, which would shine brightly, then dim, disappear, and reappear, sometimes in the same location. we observed a total of 5 lights during the encounter.My fellow employee has worked at this location for approx 10 years, and i have been there for 5 years. at no time have either of us seen anything similar in the night sky at this location.
content.summary: The objects appeared to be glowing orbs

content.detailedDescription: I contacted mufon to see if i'd been contacteddue to unease paranoia visions and memories. i didn't follow through with the offer to see a dr. then several months later i saw this outside my house while getting ready to watch a movie with my girlfriend. she doesnt really believe yet she saw it before i did. video isn't the best nor does it capture what we both saw fully. so much for hd camera on my cell. lol. please help!!!
content.summary: 3-5 craft melded disappeared returned as one light bright glowing videoed

content.detailedDescription:
1) witness was getting ready for bed at 1:00 am

2) witness was walking through the dining room and noticed a bright light in the nw window. witness called over sister to observe

3) they knew, because it happens often; every couple of months; however, this incident was a little different than any other. 

4) this sighting appeared close to if not over lake erie. the next morning the sunrise was brilliant colors and the news was actually talking about how beautiful it was.  i have never seen a sunrise like this morning.
bright white sphere in the nw sky. became large then broke apart into two, then broke apart into three.  one sphere shot to the south at a rapid speed and disappeared.  the other two spheres then joined together then dimmed, then disappeared.  within minutes it reappeared again, split apart, and started to rotate around each other, then came together as one again.  then it became very bright, then it became a very bright orange light. it slowly dimmed then disappeared.  this was all within a 1/2 hour time-frame and never reappeared again for the rest of the night.


5) again, they have seen these sighting so often that they are use to it; however, this one was much different than the past sightings. 

6) other then the object that shot to the south, the remaining sphere was stationary and dimmed, and then disappeared.
content.summary: Started as one sphere and broke into three then united as one
